title: 📘 Earner Community – Full Working Guide
content:
Welcome to the Earner Community system. Please read this guide carefully before starting any task. Following these steps properly will help you earn smoothly.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🧩 Step-by-Step Process to Start Working:

1️⃣ Go to the Dashboard or Channel and check the available app links.

2️⃣ Read all the conditions carefully mentioned with each app.

3️⃣ Join the app only through the **referral link** provided. Do not use any other link.

4️⃣ Once you've joined the app, submit your report on the dashboard with correct details.

5️⃣ Your report will be verified and you'll receive your payment.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📋 Important Steps for Video Recording:

1. Start screen recording after completing activation/trade.
2. complete activation same as provided video otherwise it may rejected.
3. After orders section continue recording, go to the user's profile page where name and ID are visible.
4. Stop the recording.
5. Send the video and the user's mobile number to this bot in the correct format. Select the right app.

If bot is not working, use /menu command.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📺 Watch Activation Videos:

Before you start, watch all demo videos to understand how to do proper activation.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

⚠️ Important Notes:

• Always use the provided referral links
• Complete registration & activation on users device
• Record activation process clearly
• Include mobile number in caption
• Follow app-specific requirements
